background_description: The spider is positioned on a piece of rough, gnarled tree bark or wood. The bark features a highly textured surface with varying shades of light grey, brownish-tan, and darker brown, interspersed with patches of greenish-yellow lichen or moss. The background is softly blurred into dark brown and green tones, indicating distant foliage or shadowy areas.
camouflage_type: Color blending / Pattern matching / Texture matching
explanation: The spider exhibits strong camouflage against the bark it is resting on. Its body color, a mix of light greyish-tan and earthy brown with darker mottling, closely matches the various shades and patterns present on the bark and its lichen growth. The spider's hairy, textured body and legs also mimic the rough, irregular surface of the bark, further enhancing its blend. This combination of color blending and pattern matching effectively breaks up its outline and reduces its contrast with the immediate environment. The only feature that distinctly stands out is its bright, reflective eyes, but the rest of its body is very well hidden.
